 Original Message 
From: Kramer, Amanda K 
Sent: Tuesday, February 09, 2021 4:22 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Call 
Hi • and 
Apologies for the delay - I  had full days set aside for witness interviews and was waiting for clarity from the client. It looks like I'm 
available Thursday 2:30-5 and Friday 2-4. Please let me know if those times work for you. 
and I  are free between 11 am and 4pm and after 5pm. 
Best, 
Amanda 
 Original Message 
From: (USANYS) ‹> 
Sent: Monday, February 8, 2021 7:08 PM 
To: Kramer, Amanda K 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Call 
[EXTERNAL] 
Hi Amanda, 
So sorry to bother you, but we wanted to follow up on scheduling in light of our pre-trial motion opposition deadline. Can you please 
let us know some times that work for you to speak? 
Thanks so much, 
 Original Message 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Saturday, February 06, 2021 1:08 PM 
To: 'Kramer, Amanda K' 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Call 
Amanda, 
I hope all is well. Sony to bother you on the weekend, but we wanted to send along the emails as discussed and reach out regarding 
scheduling. Can you please let us know some days and times that would be convenient for you to speak by phone early next week if 
EFTA00026599

possible? We are happy to speak whenever best for you. 
Thanks again, 
 Original Message 
From: Kramer, Amanda K •:(> 
Sent: Friday, January 29, 2021 9:19 PM 
To: (USANYS) e> 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Call 
Hi all, 
I'm flexible on Tuesday before 2:00. Does that work? 
Best, 
Amanda 
On Jan 29, 2021, at 9:04 PM, (USANYS) e> wrote: 
[EXTERNAL] 
Hi Amanda, 
I hope all is well with you. We are hoping to find a time for an initial call with you early next week. In advance of speaking, we 
wanted to send you your notes from a meeting in February 2016 and a link to the following article: http:thvww.nydailynews.cominew-
york/ny-jeffrerepstein-maxwell-case-20201013-jmzh17zdrzdgrbbs7yc6bfnszu-story.html. 
Can you please let us know some times that work for you? 
Thanks so much, and have a good weekend, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York
